Summary: Orange/ white Egg shaped Object..sailing slowly an Low ..no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the house when my dogs started barking an acting funny, so I grabed my camcorder an went out on front porch, I didnt see anything out there, about that time the phone rang it was my niece, we were talking, about ufos, she asked me what my dogs were barking at, I told her i didnt know, an just right out of the blue, I looked westward, an here came this slow moving Egg shaped object sailing by in front of me..it moved slowly, it was low,an it made no noise, i was telling my niece over speaker phone what i was seeing..i filmed it till i couldnt see it no more because of the huge trees,when it passed by the trees.this object changed it form to two round objects, then 3 objects to 2 straight side by side objects. I lost sight of it..this object was not above the trees..it passed below the high tree lines out there in the Cattle field..theres a huge road sign that it was slightly above It..It came from the west, an Headed Northward up along the west side.these are the actual photos from the film i shot..some are close ups others are distant..the film is on a sony 8 steady shot digital video Handycamcorder 990 X digital Zoom. I have more photos of this object
trends: there have been no other sightings in richmond\lexington
This sighting has never been favorited.
